compiler.step: Incidental movement
compiler.why: Biological engine maintenance. [Universal]

compiler.step: Outdoor light within 30m of wake
compiler.why: Resets the central clock and sleep timer. [Panda]

compiler.step: 16-hour fast. Water/Black Coffee only.
compiler.why: Triggers autophagy and insulin stability. [Attia]

compiler.step: Dry sauna at 174째F minimum.
compiler.why: Activates Heat Shock Proteins to prevent decay. [Patrick]

compiler.step: Neck-deep submersion <50째F.
compiler.why: 250% dopamine increase and mental callousing. [Huberman]

compiler.step: Compound movements (Squat/Press).
compiler.why: Primary predictor of healthspan and integrity. [Galpin]

compiler.step: No phone. No internet. Single-task focus.
compiler.why: Focus x Time = High Quality Output. [Newport]

compiler.step: 5m nightly review of failures/lies.
compiler.why: Data truth is the only path to growth. [Stoic]

compiler.step: Couch stretch and deep squat hold.
compiler.why: Offset the contractures of 21st-century sitting. [Starrett]

compiler.step: Nose breathing during sleep/exercise.
compiler.why: Efficient oxygen delivery via the Bohr Effect. [McKeown]

compiler.step: 30g+ protein in the first meal.
compiler.why: Threshold required for muscle protein synthesis. [Layman]

compiler.step: Cool room (65째F). Total darkness.
compiler.why: Clears amyloid beta neurotoxins from the brain. [Walker]

compiler.step: 4 mins Max Effort / 4 mins Rest x 4.
compiler.why: Strongest correlate to lifespan. [Attia]

compiler.step: Precision bed-make upon waking.
compiler.why: First victory establishes the standard. [Jocko]

compiler.step: 10m of meditation or prayer for others.
compiler.why: Interrupts the ego; resets Internal Force. [Aurelius]

compiler.step: One helpful act in total secrecy.
compiler.why: Virtue for its own sake, not for praise. [Aurelius]

compiler.step: Reflect for 2m: 'This could be my last day.'
compiler.why: Kills procrastination instantly. High ground. [Seneca]

compiler.step: Screens off 60m before bed.
compiler.why: Ensures deep REM and hormonal reset. [Walker]

compiler.step: Zero refined sugar or liquid calories.
compiler.why: Reduces systemic inflammation and energy crashes. [Lustig]

compiler.step: Connect with one person for 10+ mins.
compiler.why: Social isolation is a biological stressor. [Conti]

compiler.step: 30m focused practice on a high-leverage skill.
compiler.why: Growth requires both Focus and Novelty. [Huberman]

compiler.step: Review tomorrow's Big 3. Say 'Shutdown Complete'.
compiler.why: Clears attention residue for recovery. [Newport]

compiler.step: Total of 120s hanging from a bar.
compiler.why: Grip strength is the #1 proxy for longevity. [Bohannon]

compiler.step: Inhale 4, Hold 4, Exhale 4, Hold 4.
compiler.why: Tactical autonomic nervous system regulation. [McKeown]

compiler.step: 15m outside. Look at horizon. No phone.
compiler.why: Fractals reduce rumination and blood pressure. [Bratman]

compiler.step: Process inbox until empty. Archive or Task.
compiler.why: Unfinished tasks leak cognitive energy. [Ferriss]

compiler.step: Phone in a separate room during deep work.
compiler.why: Severing the connection to the digital hive mind. [Lembke]

compiler.step: Journal to identify 'Defense' vs 'Generative' drive.
compiler.why: Regain agency by identifying internal 'spies'. [Conti]

compiler.step: Did you use Code, Media, or Capital today?
compiler.why: Wealth = Leverage x Judgment. [Naval]

compiler.step: 20m walk before first calorie.
compiler.why: Mobilize fatty acids immediately upon waking. [Horowitz]

compiler.step: Bedroom at 65째F one hour before sleep.
compiler.why: Biological trigger for deep sleep onset. [Walker]

compiler.step: 10-20 min audio guide for deep rest.
compiler.why: Dopamine recovery without sleep. [Huberman]

compiler.step: 5g Creatine Monohydrate daily.
compiler.why: Increases anaerobic power and brain function. [Attia]

compiler.step: Train until the mind wants to quit.
compiler.why: Override the brain's safety governor. [Goggins]

compiler.step: Recall a moment of immense suffering you overcame.
compiler.why: Fuel for current struggle. [Goggins]

compiler.step: Face the mirror. State your insecurities.
compiler.why: Strip the ego to see the raw data truth. [Goggins]

compiler.step: Measure the duration of a single exhale.
compiler.why: Proxy for CO2 tolerance and stress resilience. [Mackenzie]

compiler.step: Attend meeting or Outreach/Service.
compiler.why: Honoring the 6.5 Year Mission. Isolation is drift.

compiler.step: Embrace a current obstacle as necessary fuel.
compiler.why: The hindrance is the path. [Aurelius]

compiler.step: Discard 3 external worries outside your control.
compiler.why: Zero energy leak on things you cannot change. [Epictetus]

compiler.step: Mg Threonate + Theanine 60m pre-bed.
compiler.why: Reduce sleep latency and improve quality. [Huberman]

compiler.step: Push for 5 more mins/reps when 'done'.
compiler.why: The mind quits long before the body. [Goggins]
